title: Prepare Return with Social Security Income
description: A retiree receives Social Security benefits and needs to determine how much, if any, is taxable.

tasks.description: Gather Form SSA-1099 and information on the retiree's other income sources.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary income documents.
Agent correctly calculates the income figure used to determine taxability.

tasks.description: Use the provisional income to determine the taxable portion (e.g., 0%, 50%, or 85%) of the Social Security benefits.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the amount of taxable Social Security benefits to include in income.
